alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:22AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND, SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE, NORTHERN GRANT, NORTHWESTERN PENDLETON AND EASTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 745 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Patriot, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Independence, Alexandria, Walton, Claryville, Union, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Glencoe, Patriot, Visalia, Atwood, Richwood, Grants Lick, Ryle, Northcutt, Big Bone Lick, Interstate 71 at US Route 127, Steele Bottom, Bracht and Gardnersville. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 62 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 160 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
